reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and high-quality, with a perfect fit that hits just above the knee. The fabric feels soft and luxurious, making it flattering for curvy women, and they appreciate its versatility, noting it can be dressed up for formal events. The color accuracy receives mixed feedback, with some loving the color while others find it slightly off. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would buy again!
items.body: Sooo cute and easy to dress up or down! Decent quality - as expected for the price point. Not lined and the fabric print is only visible on the outside of the dress. The inside is white. Fit is great and comfortable. The straps are wide enough to wear a normal bra, but the square neckline can be an issue for that. A balconette may work or a strapless with the removable straps attached. The material isn't too thick or thin. Print was gorgeous and the slight flutter on the sleeve is lovely too. Read more
items.author: ENL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect
items.body: This black summer dress is absolutely amazing! ðŸ–¤ Itâ€™s effortlessly chic, lightweight, and so flattering on every body type. The fabric feels soft and breathable â€” perfect for warm days or sunset dinners. Itâ€™s one of those dresses you can dress up with heels or keep casual with sandals, and it still looks stunning either way. The fit is perfect and the flow gives it that easy, breezy summer vibe. Iâ€™ve gotten so many compliments every time I wear it â€” truly a must-have closet staple for summer! â˜€ï¸âœ¨ Read more
items.author: Jenn Nowak

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well for a teen
items.body: Cute and appropriate for my 13 year oldâ€™s 8th grade move up ceremony. I purchased a size small and it fits her perfectly. She is about 5â€™3 and 120 lbs. Material is soft. The pattern is not double sided however, so it would be a little cheap looking for an adult to wear. Read more
items.author: T&C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST BUY
items.body: very simple style and a super comfy dress. fit as expected. there is a liner underneath. i was an exclusively pumping mom (4.5 months pp) at the time and the stretchiness made it super easy to out my wearables on. not a super thick material but definitely not thin or see through. flowed nicely, had no issues of it sticking anywhere ðŸ˜… Read more
items.author: Karlee

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress is for kids. Not worth $40.
items.body: Size: true to size Color: off. light blue should have been an ashy blue as shown in the picture but the actual color was more like baby blue Material: soft, not see through, doesnâ€™t feel like paper, but itâ€™s on the thinner side Quality: stitching is fine but itâ€™s made cheaply. Itâ€™s cute but it feels like a dress for a child or teen. Iâ€™ve seen some of the pictures in reviews and the black is the only one that appears decent on an adult women. Itâ€™s ridiculous that they are charging $40 for this dress! TLDR; I'm returning it. Donâ€™t buy it unless youâ€™re getting it for a child/teen. Even then, $40 is crazy Read more
items.author: Brittany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL DRESS
items.body: Love this dress! Material is soft & Flowy! It fits as I expected it to & I would say it is true to size! Iâ€™m 5â€™9â€ & it is often difficult to find a dress that is long enough but this one hits perfect just above the knee! Material is good quality, Iâ€™ve had this dress for nearly a year & have had no trouble with pilling! Itâ€™s easy to style up or down! I ordered it in the dark brown color & it is exactly as pictured Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute dress, great value!
items.body: This is such a cute dress, super comfortable for a night out dress up with a nice pair of shoes or just for a casual daytime look with a cute purse. The material is soft, not at all cheap and scratchy. Itâ€™s a super great price for a great little dress. Washed really well, no shrinkage. Iâ€™d really recommend the purchase! Read more

items.body: Super cute summer dress. Great quality, light and flowy. Feels great on. Fits true to size. Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ 120lbs and I purchased a size small. Read more
items.author: Lisa Pagan

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Tile Blue, Dark Sea Blue, Floral Red Pink, Grass Green, Apricot, Purple Red, Army Green, Hot Pink, Light Green, Print Floral Colour, Black, Floral Colorful Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
